p: As shown in Figure 1, when the M. oleifera seed protein was 10 mg/ml, the DPPH•, ABTS•, •OH, and O 2• − scavenging rates were 63.25%, 52.45%, 55.25%, and 59.32%, respectively. And the lipid oxidation inhibition rate was 43.25%. It shows that M. oleifera seed protein extraction has good antioxidant activity against different antioxidant models.
